title: Chocolate pizza cookie
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '190g porridge oats', '225g butter', '325g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '110g desiccated coconut', '340g plain chocolate chips', '60g chopped walnuts', '210g chocolate M&Ms or smarties', '150g peanuts']
